ygData.subject: RE: NPC's Binding
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Hmm, my party got wiped out at L17-19 by dangerous blue Gaz knights and blue-white Ton warrior/knights.  Try this.  Go over that annoying plank bridge.
ygData.messageBody:
On Wed, 14 Jul 1999, Kimes, Dean W. wrote:
>
> Trolls definitely, threatened to eat me they did! But I went in pretty far
> and the only non-green I saw was a Shin warrior and a Gaz Shaman. Maybe a

Hmm, my party got wiped out at L17-19 by dangerous blue Gaz
knights and blue-white Ton warrior/knights. Try this. Go
over that annoying plank bridge. It'll open up into a room
with a square well-looking thing in the middle. On the far
right is a hallway leading down. To the left of that is a
short passage which ends at a ledge with a plank leading down
into a large room. Go into that room. If you survive more
than 30 seconds, I'll believe you. :-) My L24 cleric friend
got lost there and was killed by a huge mob of frogs our last
Guk trip. I consider this area to be close to the middle of
Upper Guk.

At 26, the Shin warriors and shamen, Ton knights, and some Gaz
warriors were still blue to me.

> And no, being a tailor and therefore generally poor, woven isn't trash loot
> to me. Mesh is what I was really after to replace all my leather until I
> get reinforced made. Yah right, in my dreams.

Heh heh. When I did my mesh vs bronze test, I topped out at
26 pounds wearing mesh (vs. 68 for mostly bronze). I would've
loved to have stayed lightweight, but the damage I was taking
was nasty - reminded me of back when I was in my teens.

--
John H. Kim
kim@...
